subsection â€¹Definitionsâ€º

text â€¹
  Definitions follow \<^cite>â€¹"Jacobson:1985"â€º.
â€º

record 'a monoid =  "'a partial_object" +
  mult    :: "['a, 'a] â‡’ 'a" (infixl "âŠ—Ä±" 70)
  one     :: 'a ("ğŸ­Ä±")

definition
  m_inv :: "('a, 'b) monoid_scheme => 'a => 'a" ("invÄ± _" [81] 80)
  where "invâ‡˜Gâ‡™ x = (THE y. y âˆˆ carrier G âˆ§ x âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ y = ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™ âˆ§ y âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ x = ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™)"

definition
  Units :: "_ => 'a set"
  â€• â€¹The set of invertible elementsâ€º
  where "Units G = {y. y âˆˆ carrier G âˆ§ (âˆƒx âˆˆ carrier G. x âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ y = ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™ âˆ§ y âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ x = ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™)}"

locale monoid =
  fixes G (structure)
  assumes m_closed [intro, simp]:
         "âŸ¦x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier GâŸ§ âŸ¹ x âŠ— y âˆˆ carrier G"
      and m_assoc:
         "âŸ¦x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G; z âˆˆ carrier GâŸ§
          âŸ¹ (x âŠ— y) âŠ— z = x âŠ— (y âŠ— z)"
      and one_closed [intro, simp]: "ğŸ­ âˆˆ carrier G"
      and l_one [simp]: "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ ğŸ­ âŠ— x = x"
      and r_one [simp]: "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ x âŠ— ğŸ­ = x"

lemma monoidI:
  fixes G (structure)
  assumes m_closed:
      "!!x y. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G |] ==> x âŠ— y âˆˆ carrier G"
    and one_closed: "ğŸ­ âˆˆ carrier G"
    and m_assoc:
      "!!x y z. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G; z âˆˆ carrier G |] ==>
      (x âŠ— y) âŠ— z = x âŠ— (y âŠ— z)"
    and l_one: "!!x. x âˆˆ carrier G ==> ğŸ­ âŠ— x = x"
    and r_one: "!!x. x âˆˆ carrier G ==> x âŠ— ğŸ­ = x"
  shows "monoid G"
  by (fast intro!: monoid.intro intro: assms)

lemma (in monoid) Units_closed [dest]:
  "x âˆˆ Units G ==> x âˆˆ carrier G"
  by (unfold Units_def) fast

lemma (in monoid) one_unique:
  assumes "u âˆˆ carrier G"
    and "â‹€x. x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ u âŠ— x = x"
  shows "u = ğŸ­"
  using assms(2)[OF one_closed] r_one[OF assms(1)] by simp

lemma (in monoid) inv_unique:
  assumes eq: "y âŠ— x = ğŸ­"  "x âŠ— y' = ğŸ­"
    and G: "x âˆˆ carrier G"  "y âˆˆ carrier G"  "y' âˆˆ carrier G"
  shows "y = y'"
proof -
  from G eq have "y = y âŠ— (x âŠ— y')" by simp
  also from G have "... = (y âŠ— x) âŠ— y'" by (simp add: m_assoc)
  also from G eq have "... = y'" by simp
  finally show ?thesis .
qed

lemma (in monoid) Units_m_closed [simp, intro]:
  assumes x: "x âˆˆ Units G" and y: "y âˆˆ Units G"
  shows "x âŠ— y âˆˆ Units G"
proof -
  from x obtain x' where x: "x âˆˆ carrier G" "x' âˆˆ carrier G" and xinv: "x âŠ— x' = ğŸ­" "x' âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
    unfolding Units_def by fast
  from y obtain y' where y: "y âˆˆ carrier G" "y' âˆˆ carrier G" and yinv: "y âŠ— y' = ğŸ­" "y' âŠ— y = ğŸ­"
    unfolding Units_def by fast
  from x y xinv yinv have "y' âŠ— (x' âŠ— x) âŠ— y = ğŸ­" by simp
  moreover from x y xinv yinv have "x âŠ— (y âŠ— y') âŠ— x' = ğŸ­" by simp
  moreover note x y
  ultimately show ?thesis unfolding Units_def
    by simp (metis m_assoc m_closed)
qed

lemma (in monoid) Units_one_closed [intro, simp]:
  "ğŸ­ âˆˆ Units G"
  by (unfold Units_def) auto

lemma (in monoid) Units_inv_closed [intro, simp]:
  "x âˆˆ Units G ==> inv x âˆˆ carrier G"
  apply (simp add: Units_def m_inv_def)
  by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) inv_unique the_equality)

lemma (in monoid) Units_l_inv_ex:
  "x âˆˆ Units G ==> âˆƒy âˆˆ carrier G. y âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
  by (unfold Units_def) auto

lemma (in monoid) Units_r_inv_ex:
  "x âˆˆ Units G ==> âˆƒy âˆˆ carrier G. x âŠ— y = ğŸ­"
  by (unfold Units_def) auto

lemma (in monoid) Units_l_inv [simp]:
  "x âˆˆ Units G ==> inv x âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
  apply (unfold Units_def m_inv_def, simp)
  by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) inv_unique the_equality)

lemma (in monoid) Units_r_inv [simp]:
  "x âˆˆ Units G ==> x âŠ— inv x = ğŸ­"
  by (metis (full_types) Units_closed Units_inv_closed Units_l_inv Units_r_inv_ex inv_unique)

lemma (in monoid) inv_one [simp]:
  "inv ğŸ­ = ğŸ­"
  by (metis Units_one_closed Units_r_inv l_one monoid.Units_inv_closed monoid_axioms)

lemma (in monoid) Units_inv_Units [intro, simp]:
  "x âˆˆ Units G ==> inv x âˆˆ Units G"
proof -
  assume x: "x âˆˆ Units G"
  show "inv x âˆˆ Units G"
    by (auto simp add: Units_def
      intro: Units_l_inv Units_r_inv x Units_closed [OF x])
qed

lemma (in monoid) Units_l_cancel [simp]:
  "[| x âˆˆ Units G; y âˆˆ carrier G; z âˆˆ carrier G |] ==>
   (x âŠ— y = x âŠ— z) = (y = z)"
proof
  assume eq: "x âŠ— y = x âŠ— z"
    and G: "x âˆˆ Units G"  "y âˆˆ carrier G"  "z âˆˆ carrier G"
  then have "(inv x âŠ— x) âŠ— y = (inv x âŠ— x) âŠ— z"
    by (simp add: m_assoc Units_closed del: Units_l_inv)
  with G show "y = z" by simp
next
  assume eq: "y = z"
    and G: "x âˆˆ Units G"  "y âˆˆ carrier G"  "z âˆˆ carrier G"
  then show "x âŠ— y = x âŠ— z" by simp
qed

lemma (in monoid) Units_inv_inv [simp]:
  "x âˆˆ Units G ==> inv (inv x) = x"
proof -
  assume x: "x âˆˆ Units G"
  then have "inv x âŠ— inv (inv x) = inv x âŠ— x" by simp
  with x show ?thesis by (simp add: Units_closed del: Units_l_inv Units_r_inv)
qed

lemma (in monoid) inv_inj_on_Units:
  "inj_on (m_inv G) (Units G)"
proof (rule inj_onI)
  fix x y
  assume G: "x âˆˆ Units G"  "y âˆˆ Units G" and eq: "inv x = inv y"
  then have "inv (inv x) = inv (inv y)" by simp
  with G show "x = y" by simp
qed

lemma (in monoid) Units_inv_comm:
  assumes inv: "x âŠ— y = ğŸ­"
    and G: "x âˆˆ Units G"  "y âˆˆ Units G"
  shows "y âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
proof -
  from G have "x âŠ— y âŠ— x = x âŠ— ğŸ­" by (auto simp add: inv Units_closed)
  with G show ?thesis by (simp del: r_one add: m_assoc Units_closed)
qed

lemma (in monoid) carrier_not_empty: "carrier G â‰  {}"
by auto

subsection â€¹Groupsâ€º

text â€¹
  A group is a monoid all of whose elements are invertible.
â€º

locale group = monoid +
  assumes Units: "carrier G <= Units G"

lemma (in group) is_group [iff]: "group G" by (rule group_axioms)

lemma (in group) is_monoid [iff]: "monoid G"
  by (rule monoid_axioms)

theorem groupI:
  fixes G (structure)
  assumes m_closed [simp]:
      "!!x y. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G |] ==> x âŠ— y âˆˆ carrier G"
    and one_closed [simp]: "ğŸ­ âˆˆ carrier G"
    and m_assoc:
      "!!x y z. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G; z âˆˆ carrier G |] ==>
      (x âŠ— y) âŠ— z = x âŠ— (y âŠ— z)"
    and l_one [simp]: "!!x. x âˆˆ carrier G ==> ğŸ­ âŠ— x = x"
    and l_inv_ex: "!!x. x âˆˆ carrier G ==> âˆƒy âˆˆ carrier G. y âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
  shows "group G"
proof -
  have l_cancel [simp]:
    "!!x y z. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G; z âˆˆ carrier G |] ==>
    (x âŠ— y = x âŠ— z) = (y = z)"
  proof
    fix x y z
    assume eq: "x âŠ— y = x âŠ— z"
      and G: "x âˆˆ carrier G"  "y âˆˆ carrier G"  "z âˆˆ carrier G"
    with l_inv_ex obtain x_inv where xG: "x_inv âˆˆ carrier G"
      and l_inv: "x_inv âŠ— x = ğŸ­" by fast
    from G eq xG have "(x_inv âŠ— x) âŠ— y = (x_inv âŠ— x) âŠ— z"
      by (simp add: m_assoc)
    with G show "y = z" by (simp add: l_inv)
  next
    fix x y z
    assume eq: "y = z"
      and G: "x âˆˆ carrier G"  "y âˆˆ carrier G"  "z âˆˆ carrier G"
    then show "x âŠ— y = x âŠ— z" by simp
  qed
  have r_one:
    "!!x. x âˆˆ carrier G ==> x âŠ— ğŸ­ = x"
  proof -
    fix x
    assume x: "x âˆˆ carrier G"
    with l_inv_ex obtain x_inv where xG: "x_inv âˆˆ carrier G"
      and l_inv: "x_inv âŠ— x = ğŸ­" by fast
    from x xG have "x_inv âŠ— (x âŠ— ğŸ­) = x_inv âŠ— x"
      by (simp add: m_assoc [symmetric] l_inv)
    with x xG show "x âŠ— ğŸ­ = x" by simp
  qed
  have inv_ex:
    "â‹€x. x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ âˆƒy âˆˆ carrier G. y âŠ— x = ğŸ­ âˆ§ x âŠ— y = ğŸ­"
  proof -
    fix x
    assume x: "x âˆˆ carrier G"
    with l_inv_ex obtain y where y: "y âˆˆ carrier G"
      and l_inv: "y âŠ— x = ğŸ­" by fast
    from x y have "y âŠ— (x âŠ— y) = y âŠ— ğŸ­"
      by (simp add: m_assoc [symmetric] l_inv r_one)
    with x y have r_inv: "x âŠ— y = ğŸ­"
      by simp
    from x y show "âˆƒy âˆˆ carrier G. y âŠ— x = ğŸ­ âˆ§ x âŠ— y = ğŸ­"
      by (fast intro: l_inv r_inv)
  qed
  then have carrier_subset_Units: "carrier G âŠ† Units G"
    by (unfold Units_def) fast
  show ?thesis
    by standard (auto simp: r_one m_assoc carrier_subset_Units)
qed

lemma (in monoid) group_l_invI:
  assumes l_inv_ex:
    "!!x. x âˆˆ carrier G ==> âˆƒy âˆˆ carrier G. y âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
  shows "group G"
  by (rule groupI) (auto intro: m_assoc l_inv_ex)

lemma (in group) Units_eq [simp]:
  "Units G = carrier G"
proof
  show "Units G âŠ† carrier G" by fast
next
  show "carrier G âŠ† Units G" by (rule Units)
qed

lemma (in group) inv_closed [intro, simp]:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G ==> inv x âˆˆ carrier G"
  using Units_inv_closed by simp

lemma (in group) l_inv_ex [simp]:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G ==> âˆƒy âˆˆ carrier G. y âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
  using Units_l_inv_ex by simp

lemma (in group) r_inv_ex [simp]:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G ==> âˆƒy âˆˆ carrier G. x âŠ— y = ğŸ­"
  using Units_r_inv_ex by simp

lemma (in group) l_inv [simp]:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G ==> inv x âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
  by simp


subsection â€¹Cancellation Laws and Basic Propertiesâ€º

lemma (in group) inv_eq_1_iff [simp]:
  assumes "x âˆˆ carrier G" shows "invâ‡˜Gâ‡™ x = ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™ âŸ· x = ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™"
proof -
  have "x = ğŸ­" if "inv x = ğŸ­"
  proof -
    have "inv x âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
      using assms l_inv by blast
    then show "x = ğŸ­"
      using that assms by simp
  qed
  then show ?thesis
    by auto
qed

lemma (in group) r_inv [simp]:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G ==> x âŠ— inv x = ğŸ­"
  by simp

lemma (in group) right_cancel [simp]:
  "[| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G; z âˆˆ carrier G |] ==>
   (y âŠ— x = z âŠ— x) = (y = z)"
  by (metis inv_closed m_assoc r_inv r_one)

lemma (in group) inv_inv [simp]:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G ==> inv (inv x) = x"
  using Units_inv_inv by simp

lemma (in group) inv_inj:
  "inj_on (m_inv G) (carrier G)"
  using inv_inj_on_Units by simp

lemma (in group) inv_mult_group:
  "[| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G |] ==> inv (x âŠ— y) = inv y âŠ— inv x"
proof -
  assume G: "x âˆˆ carrier G"  "y âˆˆ carrier G"
  then have "inv (x âŠ— y) âŠ— (x âŠ— y) = (inv y âŠ— inv x) âŠ— (x âŠ— y)"
    by (simp add: m_assoc) (simp add: m_assoc [symmetric])
  with G show ?thesis by (simp del: l_inv Units_l_inv)
qed

lemma (in group) inv_comm:
  "[| x âŠ— y = ğŸ­; x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G |] ==> y âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
  by (rule Units_inv_comm) auto

lemma (in group) inv_equality:
     "[|y âŠ— x = ğŸ­; x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G|] ==> inv x = y"
  using inv_unique r_inv by blast

lemma (in group) inv_solve_left:
  "âŸ¦ a âˆˆ carrier G; b âˆˆ carrier G; c âˆˆ carrier G âŸ§ âŸ¹ a = inv b âŠ— c âŸ· c = b âŠ— a"
  by (metis inv_equality l_inv_ex l_one m_assoc r_inv)

lemma (in group) inv_solve_left':
  "âŸ¦ a âˆˆ carrier G; b âˆˆ carrier G; c âˆˆ carrier G âŸ§ âŸ¹ inv b âŠ— c = a âŸ· c = b âŠ— a"
  by (metis inv_equality l_inv_ex l_one m_assoc r_inv)

lemma (in group) inv_solve_right:
  "âŸ¦ a âˆˆ carrier G; b âˆˆ carrier G; c âˆˆ carrier G âŸ§ âŸ¹ a = b âŠ— inv c âŸ· b = a âŠ— c"
  by (metis inv_equality l_inv_ex l_one m_assoc r_inv)

lemma (in group) inv_solve_right':
  "âŸ¦a âˆˆ carrier G; b âˆˆ carrier G; c âˆˆ carrier GâŸ§ âŸ¹ b âŠ— inv c = a âŸ· b = a âŠ— c"
  by (auto simp: m_assoc)
  

subsection â€¹Powerâ€º

consts
  pow :: "[('a, 'm) monoid_scheme, 'a, 'b::semiring_1] => 'a"  (infixr "[^]Ä±" 75)

overloading nat_pow == "pow :: [_, 'a, nat] => 'a"
begin
  definition "nat_pow G a n = rec_nat ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™ (%u b. b âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ a) n"
end

lemma (in monoid) nat_pow_closed [intro, simp]:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G ==> x [^] (n::nat) âˆˆ carrier G"
  by (induct n) (simp_all add: nat_pow_def)

lemma (in monoid) nat_pow_0 [simp]:
  "x [^] (0::nat) = ğŸ­"
  by (simp add: nat_pow_def)

lemma (in monoid) nat_pow_Suc [simp]:
  "x [^] (Suc n) = x [^] n âŠ— x"
  by (simp add: nat_pow_def)

lemma (in monoid) nat_pow_one [simp]:
  "ğŸ­ [^] (n::nat) = ğŸ­"
  by (induct n) simp_all

lemma (in monoid) nat_pow_mult:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G ==> x [^] (n::nat) âŠ— x [^] m = x [^] (n + m)"
  by (induct m) (simp_all add: m_assoc [THEN sym])

lemma (in monoid) nat_pow_comm:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ (x [^] (n::nat)) âŠ— (x [^] (m :: nat)) = (x [^] m) âŠ— (x [^] n)"
  using nat_pow_mult[of x n m] nat_pow_mult[of x m n] by (simp add: add.commute)

lemma (in monoid) nat_pow_Suc2:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ x [^] (Suc n) = x âŠ— (x [^] n)"
  using nat_pow_mult[of x 1 n] Suc_eq_plus1[of n]
  by (metis One_nat_def Suc_eq_plus1_left l_one nat.rec(1) nat_pow_Suc nat_pow_def)

lemma (in monoid) nat_pow_pow:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G ==> (x [^] n) [^] m = x [^] (n * m::nat)"
  by (induct m) (simp, simp add: nat_pow_mult add.commute)

lemma (in monoid) nat_pow_consistent:
  "x [^] (n :: nat) = x [^]â‡˜(G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)â‡™ n"
  unfolding nat_pow_def by simp

lemma nat_pow_0 [simp]: "x [^]â‡˜Gâ‡™ (0::nat) = ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™"
  by (simp add: nat_pow_def)

lemma nat_pow_Suc [simp]: "x [^]â‡˜Gâ‡™ (Suc n) = (x [^]â‡˜Gâ‡™ n)âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ x"
  by (simp add: nat_pow_def)

lemma (in group) nat_pow_inv:
  assumes "x âˆˆ carrier G" shows "(inv x) [^] (i :: nat) = inv (x [^] i)"
proof (induction i)
  case 0 thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Suc i)
  have "(inv x) [^] Suc i = ((inv x) [^] i) âŠ— inv x"
    by simp
  also have " ... = (inv (x [^] i)) âŠ— inv x"
    by (simp add: Suc.IH Suc.prems)
  also have " ... = inv (x âŠ— (x [^] i))"
    by (simp add: assms inv_mult_group)
  also have " ... = inv (x [^] (Suc i))"
    using assms nat_pow_Suc2 by auto
  finally show ?case .
qed

overloading int_pow == "pow :: [_, 'a, int] => 'a"
begin
  definition "int_pow G a z =
   (let p = rec_nat ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™ (%u b. b âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ a)
    in if z < 0 then invâ‡˜Gâ‡™ (p (nat (-z))) else p (nat z))"
end

lemma int_pow_int: "x [^]â‡˜Gâ‡™ (int n) = x [^]â‡˜Gâ‡™ n"
  by(simp add: int_pow_def nat_pow_def)

lemma pow_nat:
  assumes "iâ‰¥0"
  shows "x [^]â‡˜Gâ‡™ nat i = x [^]â‡˜Gâ‡™ i"
proof (cases i rule: int_cases)
  case (nonneg n)
  then show ?thesis
    by (simp add: int_pow_int)
next
  case (neg n)
  then show ?thesis
    using assms by linarith
qed

lemma int_pow_0 [simp]: "x [^]â‡˜Gâ‡™ (0::int) = ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™"
  by (simp add: int_pow_def)

lemma int_pow_def2: "a [^]â‡˜Gâ‡™ z =
   (if z < 0 then invâ‡˜Gâ‡™ (a [^]â‡˜Gâ‡™ (nat (-z))) else a [^]â‡˜Gâ‡™ (nat z))"
  by (simp add: int_pow_def nat_pow_def)

lemma (in group) int_pow_one [simp]:
  "ğŸ­ [^] (z::int) = ğŸ­"
  by (simp add: int_pow_def2)

lemma (in group) int_pow_closed [intro, simp]:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G ==> x [^] (i::int) âˆˆ carrier G"
  by (simp add: int_pow_def2)

lemma (in group) int_pow_1 [simp]:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ x [^] (1::int) = x"
  by (simp add: int_pow_def2)

lemma (in group) int_pow_neg:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ x [^] (-i::int) = inv (x [^] i)"
  by (simp add: int_pow_def2)

lemma (in group) int_pow_neg_int: "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ x [^] -(int n) = inv (x [^] n)"
  by (simp add: int_pow_neg int_pow_int)

lemma (in group) int_pow_mult:
  assumes "x âˆˆ carrier G" shows "x [^] (i + j::int) = x [^] i âŠ— x [^] j"
proof -
  have [simp]: "-i - j = -j - i" by simp
  show ?thesis
    by (auto simp: assms int_pow_def2 inv_solve_left inv_solve_right nat_add_distrib [symmetric] nat_pow_mult)
qed

lemma (in group) int_pow_inv:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ (inv x) [^] (i :: int) = inv (x [^] i)"
  by (metis int_pow_def2 nat_pow_inv)

lemma (in group) int_pow_pow:
  assumes "x âˆˆ carrier G"
  shows "(x [^] (n :: int)) [^] (m :: int) = x [^] (n * m :: int)"
proof (cases)
  assume n_ge: "n â‰¥ 0" thus ?thesis
  proof (cases)
    assume m_ge: "m â‰¥ 0" thus ?thesis
      using n_ge nat_pow_pow[OF assms, of "nat n" "nat m"] int_pow_def2 [where G=G]
      by (simp add: mult_less_0_iff nat_mult_distrib)
  next
    assume m_lt: "Â¬ m â‰¥ 0" 
    with n_ge show ?thesis
      apply (simp add: int_pow_def2 mult_less_0_iff)
      by (metis assms mult_minus_right n_ge nat_mult_distrib nat_pow_pow)
  qed
next
  assume n_lt: "Â¬ n â‰¥ 0" thus ?thesis
  proof (cases)
    assume m_ge: "m â‰¥ 0" 
    have "inv x [^] (nat m * nat (- n)) = inv x [^] nat (- (m * n))"
      by (metis (full_types) m_ge mult_minus_right nat_mult_distrib)
    with m_ge n_lt show ?thesis
      by (simp add: int_pow_def2 mult_less_0_iff assms mult.commute nat_pow_inv nat_pow_pow)
  next
    assume m_lt: "Â¬ m â‰¥ 0" thus ?thesis
      using n_lt by (auto simp: int_pow_def2 mult_less_0_iff assms nat_mult_distrib_neg nat_pow_inv nat_pow_pow)
  qed
qed

lemma (in group) int_pow_diff:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ x [^] (n - m :: int) = x [^] n âŠ— inv (x [^] m)"
  by(simp only: diff_conv_add_uminus int_pow_mult int_pow_neg)

lemma (in group) inj_on_multc: "c âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ inj_on (Î»x. x âŠ— c) (carrier G)"
  by(simp add: inj_on_def)

lemma (in group) inj_on_cmult: "c âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ inj_on (Î»x. c âŠ— x) (carrier G)"
  by(simp add: inj_on_def)


lemma (in monoid) group_commutes_pow:
  fixes n::nat
  shows "âŸ¦x âŠ— y = y âŠ— x; x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier GâŸ§ âŸ¹ x [^] n âŠ— y = y âŠ— x [^] n"
  apply (induction n, auto)
  by (metis m_assoc nat_pow_closed)

lemma (in monoid) pow_mult_distrib:
  assumes eq: "x âŠ— y = y âŠ— x" and xy: "x âˆˆ carrier G" "y âˆˆ carrier G"
  shows "(x âŠ— y) [^] (n::nat) = x [^] n âŠ— y [^] n"
proof (induct n)
  case (Suc n)
  have "x âŠ— (y [^] n âŠ— y) = y [^] n âŠ— x âŠ— y"
    by (simp add: eq group_commutes_pow m_assoc xy)
  then show ?case
    using assms Suc.hyps m_assoc by auto
qed auto

lemma (in group) int_pow_mult_distrib:
  assumes eq: "x âŠ— y = y âŠ— x" and xy: "x âˆˆ carrier G" "y âˆˆ carrier G"
  shows "(x âŠ— y) [^] (i::int) = x [^] i âŠ— y [^] i"
proof (cases i rule: int_cases)
  case (nonneg n)
  then show ?thesis
    by (metis eq int_pow_int pow_mult_distrib xy)
next
  case (neg n)
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding neg
    apply (simp add: xy int_pow_neg_int del: of_nat_Suc)
    by (metis eq inv_mult_group local.nat_pow_Suc nat_pow_closed pow_mult_distrib xy)
qed

lemma (in group) pow_eq_div2:
  fixes m n :: nat
  assumes x_car: "x âˆˆ carrier G"
  assumes pow_eq: "x [^] m = x [^] n"
  shows "x [^] (m - n) = ğŸ­"
proof (cases "m < n")
  case False
  have "ğŸ­ âŠ— x [^] m = x [^] m" by (simp add: x_car)
  also have "â€¦ = x [^] (m - n) âŠ— x [^] n"
    using False by (simp add: nat_pow_mult x_car)
  also have "â€¦ = x [^] (m - n) âŠ— x [^] m"
    by (simp add: pow_eq)
  finally show ?thesis
    by (metis nat_pow_closed one_closed right_cancel x_car)
qed simp

lemma (in submonoid) finite_monoid_imp_card_positive: âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Martin Baillonâ€ºâ€º
  "finite (carrier G) ==> 0 < card H"

  assume "finite (carrier G)" and a: "~ 0 < card H"
  then have "finite H" by (blast intro: finite_subset [OF subset])
  with is_submonoid a have "submonoid {} G" by simp
  with submonoid_nonempty show ?thesis by contradiction
qed


lemma (in monoid) monoid_incl_imp_submonoid : âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Martin Baillonâ€ºâ€º

lemma (in monoid) inv_unique': âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Martin Baillonâ€ºâ€º
  assumes "x âˆˆ carrier G" "y âˆˆ carrier G"
  shows "âŸ¦ x âŠ— y = ğŸ­; y âŠ— x = ğŸ­ âŸ§ âŸ¹ y = inv x"

qed

lemma (in monoid) m_inv_monoid_consistent: âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Paulo EmÃ­lio de Vilhenaâ€ºâ€º
  assumes "x âˆˆ Units (G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)" and "submonoid H G"
  shows "invâ‡˜(G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)â‡™ x = inv x"

    using submonoid.submonoid_is_monoid[OF assms(2) monoid_axioms] .
  obtain y where y: "y âˆˆ H" "x âŠ— y = ğŸ­" "y âŠ— x = ğŸ­"

  have x: "x âˆˆ H" and in_carrier: "x âˆˆ carrier G" "y âˆˆ carrier G"

    using inv_unique'[OF in_carrier y(2-3)] by auto

subsection â€¹Subgroupsâ€º

locale subgroup =
  fixes H and G (structure)
  assumes subset: "H âŠ† carrier G"
    and m_closed [intro, simp]: "âŸ¦x âˆˆ H; y âˆˆ HâŸ§ âŸ¹ x âŠ— y âˆˆ H"
    and one_closed [simp]: "ğŸ­ âˆˆ H"
    and m_inv_closed [intro,simp]: "x âˆˆ H âŸ¹ inv x âˆˆ H"

lemma (in subgroup) is_subgroup:
  "subgroup H G" by (rule subgroup_axioms)

declare (in subgroup) group.intro [intro]

lemma (in subgroup) mem_carrier [simp]:
  "x âˆˆ H âŸ¹ x âˆˆ carrier G"
  using subset by blast

lemma (in subgroup) subgroup_is_group [intro]:
  assumes "group G"
  shows "group (Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ)"
proof -
  interpret group G by fact
  have "Group.monoid (Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ)"
    by (simp add: monoid_axioms submonoid.intro submonoid.submonoid_is_monoid subset)
  then show ?thesis
    by (rule monoid.group_l_invI) (auto intro: l_inv mem_carrier)
qed

lemma (in group) triv_subgroup: "subgroup {ğŸ­} G"
  by (auto simp: subgroup_def)

lemma subgroup_is_submonoid:
  assumes "subgroup H G" shows "submonoid H G"
  using assms by (auto intro: submonoid.intro simp add: subgroup_def)

lemma (in group) subgroup_Units:
  assumes "subgroup H G" shows "H âŠ† Units (G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)"
  using group.Units[OF subgroup.subgroup_is_group[OF assms group_axioms]] by simp

lemma (in group) m_inv_consistent [simp]:
  assumes "subgroup H G" "x âˆˆ H"
  shows "invâ‡˜(G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)â‡™ x = inv x"
  using assms m_inv_monoid_consistent[OF _ subgroup_is_submonoid] subgroup_Units[of H] by auto

lemma (in group) int_pow_consistent: âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Paulo EmÃ­lio de Vilhenaâ€ºâ€º
  assumes "subgroup H G" "x âˆˆ H"
  shows "x [^] (n :: int) = x [^]â‡˜(G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)â‡™ n"
proof (cases)
  assume ge: "n â‰¥ 0"
  hence "x [^] n = x [^] (nat n)"
    using int_pow_def2 [of G] by auto
  also have " ... = x [^]â‡˜(G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)â‡™ (nat n)"
    using nat_pow_consistent by simp
  also have " ... = x [^]â‡˜(G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)â‡™ n"
    by (metis ge int_nat_eq int_pow_int)
  finally show ?thesis .
next
  assume "Â¬ n â‰¥ 0" hence lt: "n < 0" by simp
  hence "x [^] n = inv (x [^] (nat (- n)))"
    using int_pow_def2 [of G] by auto
  also have " ... = (inv x) [^] (nat (- n))"
    by (metis assms nat_pow_inv subgroup.mem_carrier)
  also have " ... = (invâ‡˜(G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)â‡™ x) [^]â‡˜(G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)â‡™ (nat (- n))"
    using m_inv_consistent[OF assms] nat_pow_consistent by auto
  also have " ... = invâ‡˜(G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)â‡™ (x [^]â‡˜(G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)â‡™ (nat (- n)))"
    using group.nat_pow_inv[OF subgroup.subgroup_is_group[OF assms(1) is_group]] assms(2) by auto
  also have " ... = x [^]â‡˜(G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆ)â‡™ n"
    by (simp add: int_pow_def2 lt)
  finally show ?thesis .
qed

text â€¹
  Since \<^term>â€¹Hâ€º is nonempty, it contains some element \<^term>â€¹xâ€º.  Since
  it is closed under inverse, it contains â€¹inv xâ€º.  Since
  it is closed under product, it contains â€¹x âŠ— inv x = ğŸ­â€º.
â€º

lemma (in group) one_in_subset:
  "[| H âŠ† carrier G; H â‰  {}; âˆ€a âˆˆ H. inv a âˆˆ H; âˆ€aâˆˆH. âˆ€bâˆˆH. a âŠ— b âˆˆ H |]
   ==> ğŸ­ âˆˆ H"
by force

text â€¹A characterization of subgroups: closed, non-empty subset.â€º

lemma (in group) subgroupI:
  assumes subset: "H âŠ† carrier G" and non_empty: "H â‰  {}"
    and inv: "!!a. a âˆˆ H âŸ¹ inv a âˆˆ H"
    and mult: "!!a b. âŸ¦a âˆˆ H; b âˆˆ HâŸ§ âŸ¹ a âŠ— b âˆˆ H"
  shows "subgroup H G"
proof (simp add: subgroup_def assms)
  show "ğŸ­ âˆˆ H" by (rule one_in_subset) (auto simp only: assms)
qed

lemma (in group) subgroupE:
  assumes "subgroup H G"
  shows "H âŠ† carrier G"
    and "H â‰  {}"
    and "â‹€a. a âˆˆ H âŸ¹ inv a âˆˆ H"
    and "â‹€a b. âŸ¦ a âˆˆ H; b âˆˆ H âŸ§ âŸ¹ a âŠ— b âˆˆ H"
  using assms unfolding subgroup_def[of H G] by auto

declare monoid.one_closed [iff] group.inv_closed [simp]
  monoid.l_one [simp] monoid.r_one [simp] group.inv_inv [simp]

lemma subgroup_nonempty:
  "Â¬ subgroup {} G"
  by (blast dest: subgroup.one_closed)

lemma (in subgroup) finite_imp_card_positive: "finite (carrier G) âŸ¹ 0 < card H"
  using subset one_closed card_gt_0_iff finite_subset by blast

lemma (in subgroup) subgroup_is_submonoid : âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Martin Baillonâ€ºâ€º
  "submonoid H G"
  by (simp add: submonoid.intro subset)

lemma (in group) submonoid_subgroupI : âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Martin Baillonâ€ºâ€º
  assumes "submonoid H G"
    and "â‹€a. a âˆˆ H âŸ¹ inv a âˆˆ H"
  shows "subgroup H G"

lemma (in group) group_incl_imp_subgroup: âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Martin Baillonâ€ºâ€º
  assumes "H âŠ† carrier G"
    and "group (Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ)"
  shows "subgroup H G"
proof (intro submonoid_subgroupI[OF monoid_incl_imp_submonoid[OF assms(1)]])
  show "monoid (Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ)" using group_def assms by blast
  have ab_eq : "â‹€ a b. a âˆˆ H âŸ¹ b âˆˆ H âŸ¹ a âŠ—â‡˜Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆâ‡™ b = a âŠ— b" using assms by simp
  fix a  assume aH : "a âˆˆ H"
  have " invâ‡˜Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆâ‡™ a âˆˆ carrier G"
    using assms aH group.inv_closed[OF assms(2)] by auto
  moreover have "ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆâ‡™ = ğŸ­" using assms monoid.one_closed ab_eq one_def by simp
  hence "a âŠ—â‡˜Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆâ‡™ invâ‡˜Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆâ‡™ a= ğŸ­"
    using assms ab_eq aH  group.r_inv[OF assms(2)] by simp
  hence "a âŠ— invâ‡˜Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆâ‡™ a= ğŸ­"
    using aH assms group.inv_closed[OF assms(2)] ab_eq by simp
  ultimately have "invâ‡˜Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆâ‡™ a = inv a"
    by (metis aH assms(1) contra_subsetD group.inv_inv is_group local.inv_equality)
  moreover have "invâ‡˜Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆâ‡™ a âˆˆ H" 
    using aH group.inv_closed[OF assms(2)] by auto
  ultimately show "inv a âˆˆ H" by auto
qed


subsection â€¹Direct Productsâ€º

definition
  DirProd :: "_ â‡’ _ â‡’ ('a Ã— 'b) monoid" (infixr "Ã—Ã—" 80) where
  "G Ã—Ã— H =
    â¦‡carrier = carrier G Ã— carrier H,
     mult = (Î»(g, h) (g', h'). (g âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ g', h âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ h')),
     one = (ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™, ğŸ­â‡˜Hâ‡™)â¦ˆ"

lemma DirProd_monoid:
  assumes "monoid G" and "monoid H"
  shows "monoid (G Ã—Ã— H)"
proof -
  interpret G: monoid G by fact
  interpret H: monoid H by fact
  from assms
  show ?thesis by (unfold monoid_def DirProd_def, auto)
qed


textâ€¹Does not use the previous result because it's easier just to use auto.â€º
lemma DirProd_group:
  assumes "group G" and "group H"
  shows "group (G Ã—Ã— H)"
proof -
  interpret G: group G by fact
  interpret H: group H by fact
  show ?thesis by (rule groupI)
     (auto intro: G.m_assoc H.m_assoc G.l_inv H.l_inv
           simp add: DirProd_def)
qed

lemma carrier_DirProd [simp]: "carrier (G Ã—Ã— H) = carrier G Ã— carrier H"
  by (simp add: DirProd_def)

lemma one_DirProd [simp]: "ğŸ­â‡˜G Ã—Ã— Hâ‡™ = (ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™, ğŸ­â‡˜Hâ‡™)"
  by (simp add: DirProd_def)

lemma mult_DirProd [simp]: "(g, h) âŠ—â‡˜(G Ã—Ã— H)â‡™ (g', h') = (g âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ g', h âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ h')"
  by (simp add: DirProd_def)

lemma mult_DirProd': "x âŠ—â‡˜(G Ã—Ã— H)â‡™ y = (fst x âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ fst y, snd x âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ snd y)"
  by (subst mult_DirProd [symmetric]) simp

lemma DirProd_assoc: "(G Ã—Ã— H Ã—Ã— I) = (G Ã—Ã— (H Ã—Ã— I))"
  by auto

lemma inv_DirProd [simp]:
  assumes "group G" and "group H"
  assumes g: "g âˆˆ carrier G"
      and h: "h âˆˆ carrier H"
  shows "m_inv (G Ã—Ã— H) (g, h) = (invâ‡˜Gâ‡™ g, invâ‡˜Hâ‡™ h)"
proof -
  interpret G: group G by fact
  interpret H: group H by fact
  interpret Prod: group "G Ã—Ã— H"
    by (auto intro: DirProd_group group.intro group.axioms assms)
  show ?thesis by (simp add: Prod.inv_equality g h)
qed

lemma DirProd_subgroups :
  assumes "group G"
    and "subgroup H G"
    and "group K"
    and "subgroup I K"
  shows "subgroup (H Ã— I) (G Ã—Ã— K)"
proof (intro group.group_incl_imp_subgroup[OF DirProd_group[OF assms(1)assms(3)]])
  have "H âŠ† carrier G" "I âŠ† carrier K" using subgroup.subset assms by blast+
  thus "(H Ã— I) âŠ† carrier (G Ã—Ã— K)" unfolding DirProd_def by auto
  have "Group.group ((Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ) Ã—Ã— (Kâ¦‡carrier := Iâ¦ˆ))"
    using DirProd_group[OF subgroup.subgroup_is_group[OF assms(2)assms(1)]
        subgroup.subgroup_is_group[OF assms(4)assms(3)]].
  moreover have "((Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ) Ã—Ã— (Kâ¦‡carrier := Iâ¦ˆ)) = ((G Ã—Ã— K)â¦‡carrier := H Ã— Iâ¦ˆ)"
    unfolding DirProd_def using assms by simp
  ultimately show "Group.group ((G Ã—Ã— K)â¦‡carrier := H Ã— Iâ¦ˆ)" by simp
qed

subsection â€¹Homomorphisms (mono and epi) and Isomorphismsâ€º

definition
  hom :: "_ => _ => ('a => 'b) set" where
  "hom G H =
    {h. h âˆˆ carrier G â†’ carrier H âˆ§
      (âˆ€x âˆˆ carrier G. âˆ€y âˆˆ carrier G. h (x âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ y) = h x âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ h y)}"

lemma homI:
  "âŸ¦â‹€x. x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ h x âˆˆ carrier H;
    â‹€x y. âŸ¦x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier GâŸ§ âŸ¹ h (x âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ y) = h x âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ h yâŸ§ âŸ¹ h âˆˆ hom G H"
  by (auto simp: hom_def)

lemma hom_carrier: "h âˆˆ hom G H âŸ¹ h ` carrier G âŠ† carrier H"
  by (auto simp: hom_def)

lemma hom_in_carrier: "âŸ¦h âˆˆ hom G H; x âˆˆ carrier GâŸ§ âŸ¹ h x âˆˆ carrier H"
  by (auto simp: hom_def)

lemma hom_compose:
  "âŸ¦ f âˆˆ hom G H; g âˆˆ hom H I âŸ§ âŸ¹ g âˆ˜ f âˆˆ hom G I"
  unfolding hom_def by (auto simp add: Pi_iff)

lemma (in group) hom_restrict:
  assumes "h âˆˆ hom G H" and "â‹€g. g âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ h g = t g" shows "t âˆˆ hom G H"
  using assms unfolding hom_def by (auto simp add: Pi_iff)

lemma (in group) hom_compose:
  "[|h âˆˆ hom G H; i âˆˆ hom H I|] ==> compose (carrier G) i h âˆˆ hom G I"
by (fastforce simp add: hom_def compose_def)

lemma (in group) restrict_hom_iff [simp]:
  "(Î»x. if x âˆˆ carrier G then f x else g x) âˆˆ hom G H âŸ· f âˆˆ hom G H"
  by (simp add: hom_def Pi_iff)

definition iso :: "_ => _ => ('a => 'b) set"
  where "iso G H = {h. h âˆˆ hom G H âˆ§ bij_betw h (carrier G) (carrier H)}"

definition is_iso :: "_ â‡’ _ â‡’ bool" (infixr "â‰…" 60)
  where "G â‰… H = (iso G H  â‰  {})"

definition mon where "mon G H = {f âˆˆ hom G H. inj_on f (carrier G)}"

definition epi where "epi G H = {f âˆˆ hom G H. f ` (carrier G) = carrier H}"

lemma isoI:
  "âŸ¦h âˆˆ hom G H; bij_betw h (carrier G) (carrier H)âŸ§ âŸ¹ h âˆˆ iso G H"
  by (auto simp: iso_def)

lemma is_isoI: "h âˆˆ iso G H âŸ¹ G â‰… H"
  using is_iso_def by auto

lemma epi_iff_subset:
   "f âˆˆ epi G G' âŸ· f âˆˆ hom G G' âˆ§ carrier G' âŠ† f ` carrier G"
  by (auto simp: epi_def hom_def)

lemma iso_iff_mon_epi: "f âˆˆ iso G H âŸ· f âˆˆ mon G H âˆ§ f âˆˆ epi G H"
  by (auto simp: iso_def mon_def epi_def bij_betw_def)

lemma iso_set_refl: "(Î»x. x) âˆˆ iso G G"
  by (simp add: iso_def hom_def inj_on_def bij_betw_def Pi_def)

lemma id_iso: "id âˆˆ iso G G"
  by (simp add: iso_def hom_def inj_on_def bij_betw_def Pi_def)

corollary iso_refl [simp]: "G â‰… G"
  using iso_set_refl unfolding is_iso_def by auto

lemma iso_iff:
   "h âˆˆ iso G H âŸ· h âˆˆ hom G H âˆ§ h ` (carrier G) = carrier H âˆ§ inj_on h (carrier G)"
  by (auto simp: iso_def hom_def bij_betw_def)

lemma iso_imp_homomorphism:
   "h âˆˆ iso G H âŸ¹ h âˆˆ hom G H"
  by (simp add: iso_iff)

lemma trivial_hom:
   "group H âŸ¹ (Î»x. one H) âˆˆ hom G H"
  by (auto simp: hom_def Group.group_def)

lemma (in group) hom_eq:
  assumes "f âˆˆ hom G H" "â‹€x. x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ f' x = f x"
  shows "f' âˆˆ hom G H"
  using assms by (auto simp: hom_def)

lemma (in group) iso_eq:
  assumes "f âˆˆ iso G H" "â‹€x. x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ f' x = f x"
  shows "f' âˆˆ iso G H"
  using assms  by (fastforce simp: iso_def inj_on_def bij_betw_def hom_eq image_iff)

lemma (in group) iso_set_sym:
  assumes "h âˆˆ iso G H"
  shows "inv_into (carrier G) h âˆˆ iso H G"
proof -
  have h: "h âˆˆ hom G H" "bij_betw h (carrier G) (carrier H)"
    using assms by (auto simp add: iso_def bij_betw_inv_into)
  then have HG: "bij_betw (inv_into (carrier G) h) (carrier H) (carrier G)"
    by (simp add: bij_betw_inv_into)
  have "inv_into (carrier G) h âˆˆ hom H G"
    unfolding hom_def
  proof safe
    show *: "â‹€x. x âˆˆ carrier H âŸ¹ inv_into (carrier G) h x âˆˆ carrier G"
      by (meson HG bij_betwE)
    show "inv_into (carrier G) h (x âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ y) = inv_into (carrier G) h x âŠ— inv_into (carrier G) h y"
      if "x âˆˆ carrier H" "y âˆˆ carrier H" for x y
    proof (rule inv_into_f_eq)
      show "inj_on h (carrier G)"
        using bij_betw_def h(2) by blast
      show "inv_into (carrier G) h x âŠ— inv_into (carrier G) h y âˆˆ carrier G"
        by (simp add: * that)
      show "h (inv_into (carrier G) h x âŠ— inv_into (carrier G) h y) = x âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ y"
        using h bij_betw_inv_into_right [of h] unfolding hom_def by (simp add: "*" that)
    qed
  qed
  then show ?thesis
    by (simp add: Group.iso_def bij_betw_inv_into h)
qed

corollary (in group) iso_sym: "G â‰… H âŸ¹ H â‰… G"
  using iso_set_sym unfolding is_iso_def by auto

lemma iso_set_trans:
  "âŸ¦h âˆˆ Group.iso G H; i âˆˆ Group.iso H IâŸ§ âŸ¹ i âˆ˜ h âˆˆ Group.iso G I"
  by (force simp: iso_def hom_compose intro: bij_betw_trans)

corollary iso_trans [trans]: "âŸ¦G â‰… H ; H â‰… IâŸ§ âŸ¹ G â‰… I"
  using iso_set_trans unfolding is_iso_def by blast

lemma iso_same_card: "G â‰… H âŸ¹ card (carrier G) = card (carrier H)"
  using bij_betw_same_card  unfolding is_iso_def iso_def by auto

lemma iso_finite: "G â‰… H âŸ¹ finite(carrier G) âŸ· finite(carrier H)"
  by (auto simp: is_iso_def iso_def bij_betw_finite)

lemma mon_compose:
   "âŸ¦f âˆˆ mon G H; g âˆˆ mon H KâŸ§ âŸ¹ (g âˆ˜ f) âˆˆ mon G K"
  by (auto simp: mon_def intro: hom_compose comp_inj_on inj_on_subset [OF _ hom_carrier])

lemma mon_compose_rev:
   "âŸ¦f âˆˆ hom G H; g âˆˆ hom H K; (g âˆ˜ f) âˆˆ mon G KâŸ§ âŸ¹ f âˆˆ mon G H"
  using inj_on_imageI2 by (auto simp: mon_def)

lemma epi_compose:
   "âŸ¦f âˆˆ epi G H; g âˆˆ epi H KâŸ§ âŸ¹ (g âˆ˜ f) âˆˆ epi G K"
  using hom_compose by (force simp: epi_def hom_compose simp flip: image_image)

lemma epi_compose_rev:
   "âŸ¦f âˆˆ hom G H; g âˆˆ hom H K; (g âˆ˜ f) âˆˆ epi G KâŸ§ âŸ¹ g âˆˆ epi H K"
  by (fastforce simp: epi_def hom_def Pi_iff image_def set_eq_iff)

lemma iso_compose_rev:
   "âŸ¦f âˆˆ hom G H; g âˆˆ hom H K; (g âˆ˜ f) âˆˆ iso G KâŸ§ âŸ¹ f âˆˆ mon G H âˆ§ g âˆˆ epi H K"
  unfolding iso_iff_mon_epi using mon_compose_rev epi_compose_rev by blast

lemma epi_iso_compose_rev:
  assumes "f âˆˆ epi G H" "g âˆˆ hom H K" "(g âˆ˜ f) âˆˆ iso G K"
  shows "f âˆˆ iso G H âˆ§ g âˆˆ iso H K"
proof
  show "f âˆˆ iso G H"
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) assms epi_def iso_compose_rev iso_iff_mon_epi mem_Collect_eq)
  then have "f âˆˆ hom G H âˆ§ bij_betw f (carrier G) (carrier H)"
    using Group.iso_def â€¹f âˆˆ Group.iso G Hâ€º by blast
  then have "bij_betw g (carrier H) (carrier K)"
    using Group.iso_def assms(3) bij_betw_comp_iff by blast
  then show "g âˆˆ iso H K"
    using Group.iso_def assms(2) by blast
qed

lemma mon_left_invertible:
   "âŸ¦f âˆˆ hom G H; â‹€x. x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ g(f x) = xâŸ§ âŸ¹ f âˆˆ mon G H"
  by (simp add: mon_def inj_on_def) metis

lemma epi_right_invertible:
   "âŸ¦g âˆˆ hom H G; f âˆˆ carrier G â†’ carrier H; â‹€x. x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ g(f x) = xâŸ§ âŸ¹ g âˆˆ epi H G"
  by (force simp: Pi_iff epi_iff_subset image_subset_iff_funcset subset_iff)

lemma (in monoid) hom_imp_img_monoid: âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Paulo EmÃ­lio de Vilhenaâ€ºâ€º
  assumes "h âˆˆ hom G H"
  shows "monoid (H â¦‡ carrier := h ` (carrier G), one := h ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™ â¦ˆ)" (is "monoid ?h_img")
proof (rule monoidI)
  show "ğŸ­â‡˜?h_imgâ‡™ âˆˆ carrier ?h_img"
    by auto
next
  fix x y z assume "x âˆˆ carrier ?h_img" "y âˆˆ carrier ?h_img" "z âˆˆ carrier ?h_img"
  then obtain g1 g2 g3
    where g1: "g1 âˆˆ carrier G" "x = h g1"
      and g2: "g2 âˆˆ carrier G" "y = h g2"
      and g3: "g3 âˆˆ carrier G" "z = h g3"
    using image_iff[where ?f = h and ?A = "carrier G"] by auto
  have aux_lemma:
    "â‹€a b. âŸ¦ a âˆˆ carrier G; b âˆˆ carrier G âŸ§ âŸ¹ h a âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ h b = h (a âŠ— b)"
    using assms unfolding hom_def by auto

  show "x âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ ğŸ­â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ = x"
    using aux_lemma[OF g1(1) one_closed] g1(2) r_one[OF g1(1)] by simp

  show "ğŸ­â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ x = x"
    using aux_lemma[OF one_closed g1(1)] g1(2) l_one[OF g1(1)] by simp

  have "x âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ y = h (g1 âŠ— g2)"
    using aux_lemma g1 g2 by auto
  thus "x âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ y âˆˆ carrier ?h_img"
    using g1(1) g2(1) by simp

  have "(x âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ y) âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ z = h ((g1 âŠ— g2) âŠ— g3)"
    using aux_lemma g1 g2 g3 by auto
  also have " ... = h (g1 âŠ— (g2 âŠ— g3))"
    using m_assoc[OF g1(1) g2(1) g3(1)] by simp
  also have " ... = x âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ (y âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ z)"
    using aux_lemma g1 g2 g3 by auto
  finally show "(x âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ y) âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ z = x âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ (y âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ z)" .
qed

lemma (in group) hom_imp_img_group: âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Paulo EmÃ­lio de Vilhenaâ€ºâ€º
  assumes "h âˆˆ hom G H"
  shows "group (H â¦‡ carrier := h ` (carrier G), one := h ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™ â¦ˆ)" (is "group ?h_img")
proof -
  interpret monoid ?h_img
    using hom_imp_img_monoid[OF assms] .

  show ?thesis
  proof (unfold_locales)
    show "carrier ?h_img âŠ† Units ?h_img"
    proof (auto simp add: Units_def)
      have aux_lemma:
        "â‹€g1 g2. âŸ¦ g1 âˆˆ carrier G; g2 âˆˆ carrier G âŸ§ âŸ¹ h g1 âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ h g2 = h (g1 âŠ— g2)"
        using assms unfolding hom_def by auto

      fix g1 assume g1: "g1 âˆˆ carrier G"
      thus "âˆƒg2 âˆˆ carrier G. (h g2) âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ (h g1) = h ğŸ­ âˆ§ (h g1) âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ (h g2) = h ğŸ­"
        using aux_lemma[OF g1 inv_closed[OF g1]]
              aux_lemma[OF inv_closed[OF g1] g1]
              inv_closed by auto
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma (in group) iso_imp_group: âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Paulo EmÃ­lio de Vilhenaâ€ºâ€º
  assumes "G â‰… H" and "monoid H"
  shows "group H"
proof -
  obtain Ï† where phi: "Ï† âˆˆ iso G H" "inv_into (carrier G) Ï† âˆˆ iso H G"
    using iso_set_sym assms unfolding is_iso_def by blast
  define Ïˆ where psi_def: "Ïˆ = inv_into (carrier G) Ï†"

  have surj: "Ï† ` (carrier G) = (carrier H)" "Ïˆ ` (carrier H) = (carrier G)"
   and inj: "inj_on Ï† (carrier G)" "inj_on Ïˆ (carrier H)"
   and phi_hom: "â‹€g1 g2. âŸ¦ g1 âˆˆ carrier G; g2 âˆˆ carrier G âŸ§ âŸ¹ Ï† (g1 âŠ— g2) = (Ï† g1) âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ (Ï† g2)"
   and psi_hom: "â‹€h1 h2. âŸ¦ h1 âˆˆ carrier H; h2 âˆˆ carrier H âŸ§ âŸ¹ Ïˆ (h1 âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ h2) = (Ïˆ h1) âŠ— (Ïˆ h2)"
   using phi psi_def unfolding iso_def bij_betw_def hom_def by auto

  have phi_one: "Ï† ğŸ­ = ğŸ­â‡˜Hâ‡™"
  proof -
    have "(Ï† ğŸ­) âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ ğŸ­â‡˜Hâ‡™ = (Ï† ğŸ­) âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ (Ï† ğŸ­)"
      by (metis assms(2) image_eqI monoid.r_one one_closed phi_hom r_one surj(1))
    thus ?thesis
      by (metis (no_types, opaque_lifting) Units_eq Units_one_closed assms(2) f_inv_into_f imageI
          monoid.l_one monoid.one_closed phi_hom psi_def r_one surj)
  qed

  have "carrier H âŠ† Units H"
  proof
    fix h assume h: "h âˆˆ carrier H"
    let ?inv_h = "Ï† (inv (Ïˆ h))"
    have "h âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ ?inv_h = Ï† (Ïˆ h) âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ ?inv_h"
      by (simp add: f_inv_into_f h psi_def surj(1))
    also have " ... = Ï† ((Ïˆ h) âŠ— inv (Ïˆ h))"
      by (metis h imageI inv_closed phi_hom surj(2))
    also have " ... = Ï† ğŸ­"
      by (simp add: h inv_into_into psi_def surj(1))
    finally have 1: "h âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ ?inv_h = ğŸ­â‡˜Hâ‡™"
      using phi_one by simp

    have "?inv_h âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ h = ?inv_h âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ Ï† (Ïˆ h)"
      by (simp add: f_inv_into_f h psi_def surj(1))
    also have " ... = Ï† (inv (Ïˆ h) âŠ— (Ïˆ h))"
      by (metis h imageI inv_closed phi_hom surj(2))
    also have " ... = Ï† ğŸ­"
      by (simp add: h inv_into_into psi_def surj(1))
    finally have 2: "?inv_h âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ h = ğŸ­â‡˜Hâ‡™"
      using phi_one by simp

    thus "h âˆˆ Units H" unfolding Units_def using 1 2 h surj by fastforce
  qed
  thus ?thesis unfolding group_def group_axioms_def using assms(2) by simp
qed

corollary (in group) iso_imp_img_group: âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Paulo EmÃ­lio de Vilhenaâ€ºâ€º
  assumes "h âˆˆ iso G H"
  shows "group (H â¦‡ one := h ğŸ­ â¦ˆ)"
proof -
  let ?h_img = "H â¦‡ carrier := h ` (carrier G), one := h ğŸ­ â¦ˆ"
  have "h âˆˆ iso G ?h_img"
    using assms unfolding iso_def hom_def bij_betw_def by auto
  hence "G â‰… ?h_img"
    unfolding is_iso_def by auto
  hence "group ?h_img"
    using iso_imp_group[of ?h_img] hom_imp_img_monoid[of h H] assms unfolding iso_def by simp
  moreover have "carrier H = carrier ?h_img"
    using assms unfolding iso_def bij_betw_def by simp
  hence "H â¦‡ one := h ğŸ­ â¦ˆ = ?h_img"
    by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

subsubsection â€¹HOL Light's concept of an isomorphism pairâ€º

definition group_isomorphisms
  where
 "group_isomorphisms G H f g â‰¡
        f âˆˆ hom G H âˆ§ g âˆˆ hom H G âˆ§
        (âˆ€x âˆˆ carrier G. g(f x) = x) âˆ§
        (âˆ€y âˆˆ carrier H. f(g y) = y)"

lemma group_isomorphisms_sym: "group_isomorphisms G H f g âŸ¹ group_isomorphisms H G g f"
  by (auto simp: group_isomorphisms_def)

lemma group_isomorphisms_imp_iso: "group_isomorphisms G H f g âŸ¹ f âˆˆ iso G H"
by (auto simp: iso_def inj_on_def image_def group_isomorphisms_def hom_def bij_betw_def Pi_iff, metis+)

lemma (in group) iso_iff_group_isomorphisms:
  "f âˆˆ iso G H âŸ· (âˆƒg. group_isomorphisms G H f g)"
proof safe
  show "âˆƒg. group_isomorphisms G H f g" if "f âˆˆ Group.iso G H"
    unfolding group_isomorphisms_def
  proof (intro exI conjI)
    let ?g = "inv_into (carrier G) f"
    show "âˆ€xâˆˆcarrier G. ?g (f x) = x"
      by (metis (no_types, lifting) Group.iso_def bij_betw_inv_into_left mem_Collect_eq that)
    show "âˆ€yâˆˆcarrier H. f (?g y) = y"
      by (metis (no_types, lifting) Group.iso_def bij_betw_inv_into_right mem_Collect_eq that)
  qed (use Group.iso_def iso_set_sym that in â€¹blast+â€º)
next
  fix g
  assume "group_isomorphisms G H f g"
  then show "f âˆˆ Group.iso G H"
    by (auto simp: iso_def group_isomorphisms_def hom_in_carrier intro: bij_betw_byWitness)
qed


subsubsection â€¹Involving direct productsâ€º

lemma DirProd_commute_iso_set:
  shows "(Î»(x,y). (y,x)) âˆˆ iso (G Ã—Ã— H) (H Ã—Ã— G)"
  by (auto simp add: iso_def hom_def inj_on_def bij_betw_def)

corollary DirProd_commute_iso :
"(G Ã—Ã— H) â‰… (H Ã—Ã— G)"
  using DirProd_commute_iso_set unfolding is_iso_def by blast

lemma DirProd_assoc_iso_set:
  shows "(Î»(x,y,z). (x,(y,z))) âˆˆ iso (G Ã—Ã— H Ã—Ã— I) (G Ã—Ã— (H Ã—Ã— I))"
by (auto simp add: iso_def hom_def inj_on_def bij_betw_def)

lemma (in group) DirProd_iso_set_trans:
  assumes "g âˆˆ iso G G2"
    and "h âˆˆ iso H I"
  shows "(Î»(x,y). (g x, h y)) âˆˆ iso (G Ã—Ã— H) (G2 Ã—Ã— I)"
proof-
  have "(Î»(x,y). (g x, h y)) âˆˆ hom (G Ã—Ã— H) (G2 Ã—Ã— I)"
    using assms unfolding iso_def hom_def by auto
  moreover have " inj_on (Î»(x,y). (g x, h y)) (carrier (G Ã—Ã— H))"
    using assms unfolding iso_def DirProd_def bij_betw_def inj_on_def by auto
  moreover have "(Î»(x, y). (g x, h y)) ` carrier (G Ã—Ã— H) = carrier (G2 Ã—Ã— I)"
    using assms unfolding iso_def bij_betw_def image_def DirProd_def by fastforce
  ultimately show "(Î»(x,y). (g x, h y)) âˆˆ iso (G Ã—Ã— H) (G2 Ã—Ã— I)"
    unfolding iso_def bij_betw_def by auto
qed

corollary (in group) DirProd_iso_trans :
  assumes "G â‰… G2" and "H â‰… I"
  shows "G Ã—Ã— H â‰… G2 Ã—Ã— I"
  using DirProd_iso_set_trans assms unfolding is_iso_def by blast

lemma hom_pairwise: "f âˆˆ hom G (DirProd H K) âŸ· (fst âˆ˜ f) âˆˆ hom G H âˆ§ (snd âˆ˜ f) âˆˆ hom G K"
  apply (auto simp: hom_def mult_DirProd' dest: Pi_mem)
   apply (metis Product_Type.mem_Times_iff comp_eq_dest_lhs funcset_mem)
  by (metis mult_DirProd prod.collapse)

lemma hom_paired:
   "(Î»x. (f x,g x)) âˆˆ hom G (DirProd H K) âŸ· f âˆˆ hom G H âˆ§ g âˆˆ hom G K"
  by (simp add: hom_pairwise o_def)

  shows "(Î»(x,y). (f x,g y)) âˆˆ hom (DirProd G H) (DirProd G' H') âŸ· f âˆˆ hom G G' âˆ§ g âˆˆ hom H H'"

  shows "(Î»(x,y). (f x,g y)) âˆˆ iso (DirProd G H) (DirProd G' H') âŸ· f âˆˆ iso G G' âˆ§ g âˆˆ iso H H'"

  by (fastforce simp add: iso_def inj_on_def bij_betw_def hom_paired2 image_paired_Times
      times_eq_iff group_def monoid.carrier_not_empty)

subsectionâ€¹The locale for a homomorphism between two groupsâ€º

textâ€¹Basis for homomorphism proofs: we assume two groups \<^term>â€¹Gâ€º and
  \<^term>â€¹Hâ€º, with a homomorphism \<^term>â€¹hâ€º between themâ€º
locale group_hom = G?: group G + H?: group H for G (structure) and H (structure) +
  fixes h
  assumes homh [simp]: "h âˆˆ hom G H"

declare group_hom.homh [simp]

lemma (in group_hom) hom_mult [simp]:
  "[| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G |] ==> h (x âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ y) = h x âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ h y"
proof -
  assume "x âˆˆ carrier G" "y âˆˆ carrier G"
  with homh [unfolded hom_def] show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma (in group_hom) hom_closed [simp]:
  "x âˆˆ carrier G ==> h x âˆˆ carrier H"
proof -
  assume "x âˆˆ carrier G"
  with homh [unfolded hom_def] show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma (in group_hom) one_closed: "h ğŸ­ âˆˆ carrier H"
  by simp

lemma (in group_hom) hom_one [simp]: "h ğŸ­ = ğŸ­â‡˜Hâ‡™"
proof -
  have "h ğŸ­ âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ ğŸ­â‡˜Hâ‡™ = h ğŸ­ âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ h ğŸ­"
    by (simp add: hom_mult [symmetric] del: hom_mult)
  then show ?thesis
    by (metis H.Units_eq H.Units_l_cancel H.one_closed local.one_closed)
qed

lemma hom_one:
  assumes "h âˆˆ hom G H" "group G" "group H"
  shows "h (one G) = one H"
  apply (rule group_hom.hom_one)
  by (simp add: assms group_hom_axioms_def group_hom_def)

lemma hom_mult:
  "âŸ¦h âˆˆ hom G H; x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier GâŸ§ âŸ¹ h (x âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ y) = h x âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ h y"
  by (auto simp: hom_def)

  "x âˆˆ carrier G ==> h (inv x) âˆˆ carrier H"
  by simp

lemma (in group_hom) hom_inv [simp]:
  assumes "x âˆˆ carrier G" shows "h (inv x) = invâ‡˜Hâ‡™ (h x)"
proof -
  have "h x âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ h (inv x) = h x âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ invâ‡˜Hâ‡™ (h x)" 
    using assms by (simp flip: hom_mult)
  with assms show ?thesis by (simp del: H.r_inv H.Units_r_inv)
qed

lemma iso_restrict:
  assumes "Ï† âˆˆ iso G F"
  assumes groups: "group G" "group F"
  assumes HG: "subgroup H G"
  shows "(restrict Ï† H) âˆˆ iso (Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ) (Fâ¦‡carrier := Ï† ` Hâ¦ˆ)"
proof -
  have "â‹€x y. âŸ¦x âˆˆ H; y âˆˆ H; x âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ y âˆˆ HâŸ§ âŸ¹ Ï† (x âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ y) = Ï† x âŠ—â‡˜Fâ‡™ Ï† y"
    by (meson assms hom_mult iso_imp_homomorphism subgroup.mem_carrier)
  moreover have "â‹€x y. âŸ¦x âˆˆ H; y âˆˆ H; x âŠ—â‡˜Gâ‡™ y âˆ‰ HâŸ§ âŸ¹ Ï† x âŠ—â‡˜Fâ‡™ Ï† y = undefined"
    by (simp add: HG subgroup.m_closed)
  moreover have "â‹€x y. âŸ¦x âˆˆ H; y âˆˆ H; Ï† x = Ï† yâŸ§ âŸ¹ x = y"
    by (smt (verit, ccfv_SIG) assms group.iso_iff_group_isomorphisms group_isomorphisms_def subgroup.mem_carrier)
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by (auto simp: iso_def hom_def bij_betw_def inj_on_def)
qed

subsection â€¹Commutative Structuresâ€º

text â€¹
  Naming convention: multiplicative structures that are commutative
  are called \emph{commutative}, additive structures are called
  \emph{Abelian}.
â€º

locale comm_monoid = monoid +
  assumes m_comm: "âŸ¦x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier GâŸ§ âŸ¹ x âŠ— y = y âŠ— x"

lemma (in comm_monoid) m_lcomm:
  "âŸ¦x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G; z âˆˆ carrier GâŸ§ âŸ¹
   x âŠ— (y âŠ— z) = y âŠ— (x âŠ— z)"
proof -
  assume xyz: "x âˆˆ carrier G"  "y âˆˆ carrier G"  "z âˆˆ carrier G"
  from xyz have "x âŠ— (y âŠ— z) = (x âŠ— y) âŠ— z" by (simp add: m_assoc)
  also from xyz have "... = (y âŠ— x) âŠ— z" by (simp add: m_comm)
  also from xyz have "... = y âŠ— (x âŠ— z)" by (simp add: m_assoc)
  finally show ?thesis .
qed

lemmas (in comm_monoid) m_ac = m_assoc m_comm m_lcomm

lemma comm_monoidI:
  fixes G (structure)
  assumes m_closed:
      "!!x y. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G |] ==> x âŠ— y âˆˆ carrier G"
    and one_closed: "ğŸ­ âˆˆ carrier G"
    and m_assoc:
      "!!x y z. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G; z âˆˆ carrier G |] ==>
      (x âŠ— y) âŠ— z = x âŠ— (y âŠ— z)"
    and l_one: "!!x. x âˆˆ carrier G ==> ğŸ­ âŠ— x = x"
    and m_comm:
      "!!x y. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G |] ==> x âŠ— y = y âŠ— x"
  shows "comm_monoid G"
  using l_one
    by (auto intro!: comm_monoid.intro comm_monoid_axioms.intro monoid.intro
             intro: assms simp: m_closed one_closed m_comm)

lemma (in monoid) monoid_comm_monoidI:
  assumes m_comm:
      "!!x y. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G |] ==> x âŠ— y = y âŠ— x"
  shows "comm_monoid G"
  by (rule comm_monoidI) (auto intro: m_assoc m_comm)

lemma (in comm_monoid) submonoid_is_comm_monoid :
  assumes "submonoid H G"
  shows "comm_monoid (Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ)"
proof (intro monoid.monoid_comm_monoidI)
  show "monoid (Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ)"
    using submonoid.submonoid_is_monoid assms comm_monoid_axioms comm_monoid_def by blast
  show "â‹€x y. x âˆˆ carrier (Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ) âŸ¹ y âˆˆ carrier (Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ)
        âŸ¹ x âŠ—â‡˜Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆâ‡™ y = y âŠ—â‡˜Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆâ‡™ x" 
    by simp (meson assms m_comm submonoid.mem_carrier)
qed

locale comm_group = comm_monoid + group

lemma (in group) group_comm_groupI:
  assumes m_comm: "!!x y. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G |] ==> x âŠ— y = y âŠ— x"
  shows "comm_group G"
  by standard (simp_all add: m_comm)

lemma comm_groupI:
  fixes G (structure)
  assumes m_closed:
      "!!x y. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G |] ==> x âŠ— y âˆˆ carrier G"
    and one_closed: "ğŸ­ âˆˆ carrier G"
    and m_assoc:
      "!!x y z. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G; z âˆˆ carrier G |] ==>
      (x âŠ— y) âŠ— z = x âŠ— (y âŠ— z)"
    and m_comm:
      "!!x y. [| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G |] ==> x âŠ— y = y âŠ— x"
    and l_one: "!!x. x âˆˆ carrier G ==> ğŸ­ âŠ— x = x"
    and l_inv_ex: "!!x. x âˆˆ carrier G ==> âˆƒy âˆˆ carrier G. y âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
  shows "comm_group G"
  by (fast intro: group.group_comm_groupI groupI assms)

lemma comm_groupE:
  fixes G (structure)
  assumes "comm_group G"
  shows "â‹€x y. âŸ¦ x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G âŸ§ âŸ¹ x âŠ— y âˆˆ carrier G"
    and "ğŸ­ âˆˆ carrier G"
    and "â‹€x y z. âŸ¦ x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G; z âˆˆ carrier G âŸ§ âŸ¹ (x âŠ— y) âŠ— z = x âŠ— (y âŠ— z)"
    and "â‹€x y. âŸ¦ x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G âŸ§ âŸ¹ x âŠ— y = y âŠ— x"
    and "â‹€x. x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ ğŸ­ âŠ— x = x"
    and "â‹€x. x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ âˆƒy âˆˆ carrier G. y âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
  apply (simp_all add: group.axioms assms comm_group.axioms comm_monoid.m_comm comm_monoid.m_ac(1))
  by (simp_all add: Group.group.axioms(1) assms comm_group.axioms(2) monoid.m_closed group.r_inv_ex)

  "[| x âˆˆ carrier G; y âˆˆ carrier G |] ==> inv (x âŠ— y) = inv x âŠ— inv y"

lemma (in comm_monoid) hom_imp_img_comm_monoid: âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Paulo EmÃ­lio de Vilhenaâ€ºâ€º
  assumes "h âˆˆ hom G H"
  shows "comm_monoid (H â¦‡ carrier := h ` (carrier G), one := h ğŸ­â‡˜Gâ‡™ â¦ˆ)" (is "comm_monoid ?h_img")

  then obtain g1 g2
    where g1: "g1 âˆˆ carrier G" "x = h g1"
      and g2: "g2 âˆˆ carrier G" "y = h g2"
    by auto
  have "x âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ y = h (g1 âŠ— g2)"
    using g1 g2 assms unfolding hom_def by auto
  also have " ... = h (g2 âŠ— g1)"
    using m_comm[OF g1(1) g2(1)] by simp
  also have " ... = y âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ x"
    using g1 g2 assms unfolding hom_def by auto
  finally show "x âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ y = y âŠ—â‡˜(?h_img)â‡™ x" .

lemma (in comm_group) hom_imp_img_comm_group: âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Paulo EmÃ­lio de Vilhenaâ€ºâ€º

lemma (in comm_group) iso_imp_img_comm_group: âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Paulo EmÃ­lio de Vilhenaâ€ºâ€º
  assumes "h âˆˆ iso G H"

lemma (in comm_group) iso_imp_comm_group: âœâ€¹contributor â€¹Paulo EmÃ­lio de Vilhenaâ€ºâ€º
  assumes "G â‰… H" "monoid H"
  shows "comm_group H"

  hence comm_gr: "comm_group (H â¦‡ one := h ğŸ­ â¦ˆ)"

  hence "â‹€x. x âˆˆ carrier H âŸ¹ h ğŸ­ âŠ—â‡˜Hâ‡™ x = x"
    using monoid.l_one[of "H â¦‡ one := h ğŸ­ â¦ˆ"] unfolding comm_group_def comm_monoid_def by simp
  moreover have "h ğŸ­ âˆˆ carrier H"
    using h one_closed unfolding iso_def hom_def by auto
  ultimately have "h ğŸ­ = ğŸ­â‡˜Hâ‡™"
    using monoid.one_unique[OF assms(2), of "h ğŸ­"] by simp
  hence "H = H â¦‡ one := h ğŸ­ â¦ˆ"
    by simp
  thus ?thesis

(*A subgroup of a subgroup is a subgroup of the group*)
lemma (in group) incl_subgroup:
  assumes "subgroup J G"
    and "subgroup I (Gâ¦‡carrier:=Jâ¦ˆ)"
  shows "subgroup I G" unfolding subgroup_def
proof
  have H1: "I âŠ† carrier (Gâ¦‡carrier:=Jâ¦ˆ)" using assms(2) subgroup.subset by blast
  also have H2: "...âŠ†J" by simp
  also  have "...âŠ†(carrier G)"  by (simp add: assms(1) subgroup.subset)
  finally have H: "I âŠ† carrier G" by simp
  have "(â‹€x y. âŸ¦x âˆˆ I ; y âˆˆ IâŸ§ âŸ¹ x âŠ— y âˆˆ I)" using assms(2) by (auto simp add: subgroup_def)
  thus  "I âŠ† carrier G âˆ§ (âˆ€x y. x âˆˆ I âŸ¶ y âˆˆ I âŸ¶ x âŠ— y âˆˆ I)"  using H by blast
  have K: "ğŸ­ âˆˆ I" using assms(2) by (auto simp add: subgroup_def)
  have "(â‹€x. x âˆˆ I âŸ¹ inv x âˆˆ I)" using assms  subgroup.m_inv_closed H
    by (metis H1 H2 m_inv_consistent subsetCE)
  thus "ğŸ­ âˆˆ I âˆ§ (âˆ€x. x âˆˆ I âŸ¶ inv x âˆˆ I)" using K by blast
qed

(*A subgroup included in another subgroup is a subgroup of the subgroup*)

        assms(1-2)[THEN subgroup.subgroup_is_group[OF _ group_axioms]] assms(3) by auto


subsection â€¹The Lattice of Subgroups of a Groupâ€º

text_raw â€¹\label{sec:subgroup-lattice}â€º

theorem (in group) subgroups_partial_order:
  "partial_order â¦‡carrier = {H. subgroup H G}, eq = (=), le = (âŠ†)â¦ˆ"
  by standard simp_all

lemma (in group) subgroup_self:
  "subgroup (carrier G) G"
  by (rule subgroupI) auto

lemma (in group) subgroup_imp_group:
  "subgroup H G ==> group (Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ)"
  by (erule subgroup.subgroup_is_group) (rule group_axioms)

lemma (in group) subgroup_mult_equality:
  "âŸ¦ subgroup H G; h1 âˆˆ H; h2 âˆˆ H âŸ§ âŸ¹  h1 âŠ—â‡˜G â¦‡ carrier := H â¦ˆâ‡™ h2 = h1 âŠ— h2"
  unfolding subgroup_def by simp

theorem (in group) subgroups_Inter:
  assumes subgr: "(â‹€H. H âˆˆ A âŸ¹ subgroup H G)"
    and not_empty: "A â‰  {}"
  shows "subgroup (â‹‚A) G"
proof (rule subgroupI)
  from subgr [THEN subgroup.subset] and not_empty
  show "â‹‚A âŠ† carrier G" by blast
next
  from subgr [THEN subgroup.one_closed]
  show "â‹‚A â‰  {}" by blast
next
  fix x assume "x âˆˆ â‹‚A"
  with subgr [THEN subgroup.m_inv_closed]
  show "inv x âˆˆ â‹‚A" by blast
next
  fix x y assume "x âˆˆ â‹‚A" "y âˆˆ â‹‚A"
  with subgr [THEN subgroup.m_closed]
  show "x âŠ— y âˆˆ â‹‚A" by blast
qed

lemma (in group) subgroups_Inter_pair :
  assumes "subgroup I G" "subgroup J G" shows "subgroup (Iâˆ©J) G" 
  using subgroups_Inter[ where ?A = "{I,J}"] assms by auto

theorem (in group) subgroups_complete_lattice:
  "complete_lattice â¦‡carrier = {H. subgroup H G}, eq = (=), le = (âŠ†)â¦ˆ"
    (is "complete_lattice ?L")
proof (rule partial_order.complete_lattice_criterion1)
  show "partial_order ?L" by (rule subgroups_partial_order)
next
  have "greatest ?L (carrier G) (carrier ?L)"
    by (unfold greatest_def) (simp add: subgroup.subset subgroup_self)
  then show "âˆƒG. greatest ?L G (carrier ?L)" ..
next
  fix A
  assume L: "A âŠ† carrier ?L" and non_empty: "A â‰  {}"
  then have Int_subgroup: "subgroup (â‹‚A) G"
    by (fastforce intro: subgroups_Inter)
  have "greatest ?L (â‹‚A) (Lower ?L A)" (is "greatest _ ?Int _")
  proof (rule greatest_LowerI)
    fix H
    assume H: "H âˆˆ A"
    with L have subgroupH: "subgroup H G" by auto
    from subgroupH have groupH: "group (G â¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ)" (is "group ?H")
      by (rule subgroup_imp_group)
    from groupH have monoidH: "monoid ?H"
      by (rule group.is_monoid)
    from H have Int_subset: "?Int âŠ† H" by fastforce
    then show "le ?L ?Int H" by simp
  next
    fix H
    assume H: "H âˆˆ Lower ?L A"
    with L Int_subgroup show "le ?L H ?Int"
      by (fastforce simp: Lower_def intro: Inter_greatest)
  next
    show "A âŠ† carrier ?L" by (rule L)
  next
    show "?Int âˆˆ carrier ?L" by simp (rule Int_subgroup)
  qed
  then show "âˆƒI. greatest ?L I (Lower ?L A)" ..
qed

subsectionâ€¹The units in any monoid give rise to a groupâ€º

text â€¹Thanks to Jeremy Avigad. The file Residues.thy provides some infrastructure to use
  facts about the unit group within the ring locale.
â€º

definition units_of :: "('a, 'b) monoid_scheme â‡’ 'a monoid"
  where "units_of G =
    â¦‡carrier = Units G, Group.monoid.mult = Group.monoid.mult G, one  = one Gâ¦ˆ"

lemma (in monoid) units_group: "group (units_of G)"
proof -
  have "â‹€x y z. âŸ¦x âˆˆ Units G; y âˆˆ Units G; z âˆˆ Units GâŸ§ âŸ¹ x âŠ— y âŠ— z = x âŠ— (y âŠ— z)"
    by (simp add: Units_closed m_assoc)
  moreover have "â‹€x. x âˆˆ Units G âŸ¹ âˆƒyâˆˆUnits G. y âŠ— x = ğŸ­"
    using Units_l_inv by blast
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding units_of_def
    by (force intro!: groupI)
qed

lemma (in comm_monoid) units_comm_group: "comm_group (units_of G)"
proof -
  have "â‹€x y. âŸ¦x âˆˆ carrier (units_of G); y âˆˆ carrier (units_of G)âŸ§
              âŸ¹ x âŠ—â‡˜units_of Gâ‡™ y = y âŠ—â‡˜units_of Gâ‡™ x"
    by (simp add: Units_closed m_comm units_of_def)
  then show ?thesis
    by (rule group.group_comm_groupI [OF units_group]) auto
qed

lemma units_of_carrier: "carrier (units_of G) = Units G"
  by (auto simp: units_of_def)

lemma units_of_mult: "mult (units_of G) = mult G"
  by (auto simp: units_of_def)

lemma units_of_one: "one (units_of G) = one G"
  by (auto simp: units_of_def)

lemma (in monoid) units_of_inv:
  assumes "x âˆˆ Units G"
  shows "m_inv (units_of G) x = m_inv G x"
  by (simp add: assms group.inv_equality units_group units_of_carrier units_of_mult units_of_one)

lemma units_of_units [simp] : "Units (units_of G) = Units G"
  unfolding units_of_def Units_def by force

lemma (in group) surj_const_mult: "a âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ (Î»x. a âŠ— x) ` carrier G = carrier G"
  apply (auto simp add: image_def)
  by (metis inv_closed inv_solve_left m_closed)

lemma (in group) l_cancel_one [simp]: "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ a âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ x âŠ— a = x âŸ· a = one G"
  by (metis Units_eq Units_l_cancel monoid.r_one monoid_axioms one_closed)

lemma (in group) r_cancel_one [simp]: "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ a âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ a âŠ— x = x âŸ· a = one G"
  by (metis monoid.l_one monoid_axioms one_closed right_cancel)

lemma (in group) l_cancel_one' [simp]: "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ a âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ x = x âŠ— a âŸ· a = one G"
  using l_cancel_one by fastforce

lemma (in group) r_cancel_one' [simp]: "x âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ a âˆˆ carrier G âŸ¹ x = a âŠ— x âŸ· a = one G"
  using r_cancel_one by fastforce

declare pow_nat [simp] (*causes looping if added above, especially with int_pow_def2*)
